description: Base for all of the layout mixins.

context.name: Layout

usedBy.description: Positions the children out of the flow of it's current context.
Centers a single child horizontally and vertically.

context.name: BullseyeLayout

usedBy.description: Positions the children horizontally, and controls the width of the children.

context.name: ContainerLayout

usedBy.description: Positions children on the same axis, and centers those children on the axis.

context.name: LevelLayout

usedBy.description: Layers the children over one another.
Positions the children on the same axis.

context.name: SplitLayout

usedBy.description: Positions children one after the other vertically.
Positions children on the same row, but allows them to be place on the next row if space doesn't permit. The children have controlled dimensions.

description: Positions the children out of the flow of it's current context.
Centers a single child horizontally and vertically.

context.name: BullseyeLayout

description: Positions the children horizontally, and controls the width of the children.

context.name: ContainerLayout

parameter.name: maximum-width
parameter.description: the maximum width of the container

description: Positions children on the same axis, and centers those children on the axis.

context.name: LevelLayout

description: Layers the children over one another.
Positions the children on the same axis.

context.name: SplitLayout

description: Positions children one after the other vertically.
Positions children on the same row, but allows them to be place on the next row if space doesn't permit. The children have controlled dimensions.

parameter.name: columns
parameter.description: the number of columns in the tile-board (default - 5)

context.name: pf-button-variant
